title: Tests missing @Test annototation
body:
Hi, 

I noticed that a large number of tests are present in the test code but they are not executed because they are missing the `@Test` annotation.

Why are these test not executed?

```
org.jfree.chart.annotations.XYBoxAnnotationTest.testCloning()
org.jfree.chart.annotations.XYBoxAnnotationTest.testDrawWithNullInfo()
org.jfree.chart.annotations.XYBoxAnnotationTest.testHashCode()
org.jfree.chart.annotations.XYBoxAnnotationTest.testPublicCloneable()
org.jfree.chart.annotations.XYBoxAnnotationTest.testSerialization()]

org.jfree.chart.block.BorderArrangementTest.testSizingWithWidthConstraint()

org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.XYShapeRendererTest.test3026341()
org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.XYShapeRendererTest.testCloning()
org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.XYShapeRendererTest.testFindZBounds()
org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.XYShapeRendererTest.testSerialization()

org.jfree.chart.util.LogFormatTest.testCloning()
org.jfree.chart.util.LogFormatTest.testHashcode()
org.jfree.chart.util.LogFormatTest.testSerialization()

org.jfree.chart.util.RelativeDateFormatTest.test2033092()
org.jfree.chart.util.RelativeDateFormatTest.testCloning()
org.jfree.chart.util.RelativeDateFormatTest.testHashCode()
org.jfree.chart.util.RelativeDateFormatTest.testNegative()

org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testAddValue()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testBug1835955()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testCloning()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testEquals()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testGetColumnCount()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testGetRowCount()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testGetValue2()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testIncrementValue()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testPublicCloneable()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testRemoveColumn()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testRemoveRow()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testRemoveValue()
org.jfree.data.category.DefaultCategoryDatasetTest.testSerialization()

org.jfree.data.gantt.TaskSeriesCollectionTest.testGetColumnKey()

org.jfree.data.general.DefaultKeyedValues2DDatasetTest.testSerialization()

org.jfree.data.general.DefaultKeyedValuesDatasetTest.testSerialization()

org.jfree.data.general.DefaultPieDatasetTest.testCloning()
org.jfree.data.general.DefaultPieDatasetTest.testGetIndex()
org.jfree.data.general.DefaultPieDatasetTest.testGetKey()

org.jfree.data.general.DefaultPieDatasetTest.testSerialization()

org.jfree.chart.util.RelativeDateFormatTest.testEquals()

org.jfree.chart.plot.XYPlotTest.testGetDatasetCount()
```
